hero.title: Smart Computer Room Management System
hero.paragraph: A modern solution to simplify tracking, maintenance, and optimization of your computer room operations.

about.title: About the System
about.paragraph1: The Computer Room Management System is built to address the challenges in operating large or small-scale computer rooms...
about.paragraph2: The goal of the system is to improve management efficiency, minimize equipment downtime, and provide a better end-user experience.

manageEquipment.title: Equipment Management
manageEquipment.text: Track detailed information, configuration, and status of each computer, room, and floor.

reportIssue.title: Issue Reporting
reportIssue.text: Allows users to easily report errors, administrators receive and update processing progress.

statistics.title: Statistics & Reports
statistics.text: Provides visual reports on usage status, operational performance, and incident history.
